sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react';
import { Form, Col, InputGroup, Button, OverlayTrigger, Tooltip } from 'react-bootstrap';
import '../index.css'

class BondPricingOne extends Component {
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);
        this.state = {
            showTooltip: { visibility: 'visible' }
        };

        this.onUpdateEnter = this.onUpdateEnter.bind(this)
    }

    onUpdateEnter(e) {
        e.preventDefault();

        setTimeout(() => {
            this.setState({ showTooltip: { visibility: 'hidden' } })
        }, 3500)
    }

    onSubmit(e) {
        e.preventDefault();

        console.log(e.target)
    }

    render() {
        return (
            <div style={{ width: '75%', margin: 'auto', marginTop: '2em' }}>
                <Form onSubmit={this.onSubmit} style={{ fontSize: '14px' }}>
                    <Form.Row>
                        <Col>
                            <Form.Label>VALUE AS OF</Form.Label>
                            <InputGroup>
                                <Form.Control
                                    type="text"
                                    placeholder="Month"
                                />
                                <InputGroup.Append>
                                    <InputGroup.Text id="inputGroupPrepend">/</InputGroup.Text>
                                </InputGroup.Append>
                                <Form.Control
                                    type="text"
                                    placeholder="Year"
                                    style={{ marginLeft: '-1px' }}
                                />
                            </InputGroup>
                        </Col>
                        <Col>
                            <OverlayTrigger placement='right' overlay={
                                <Tooltip style={this.state.showTooltip} >
                                    Revalue all bonds by this date.
                                    </Tooltip>}>
                                <Button type="submit" onMouseEnter={this.onUpdateEnter} variant='success' style={{ marginTop: '1.8em' }}>UPDATE</Button>
                            </OverlayTrigger>
                        </Col>
                        <Col></Col>
                        <Col></Col>
                        <Col>
                            <Button type="submit" style={{ marginTop: '1.8em', float: 'right' }}>SUBMIT</Button>
                        </Col>
                    </Form.Row>
                    <Form.Row style={{ marginTop: '2em' }}>
                        <Col>
                            <Form.Label>SERIES</Form.Label>
                            <Form.Control as="select" custom>
                                <option>EE Bond</option>
                                <option>I Bond</option>
                                <option>E Bond</option>
                                <option>Savings Note</option>
                            </Form.Control>
                        </Col>
                        <Col>
                            <Form.Label>DENOMINATION</Form.Label>
                            <Form.Control as="select" custom>
                                <option>$25</option>
                                <option>$50</option>
                                <option>$75</option>
                                <option>$100</option>
                                <option>$200</option>
                                <option>$500</option>
                                <option>$1,000</option>
                                <option>$5,000</option>
                                <option>$10,000</option>
                            </Form.Control>
                        </Col>
                        <Col>
                            <Form.Label size='sm'>SERIAL NUMBER</Form.Label>
                            <Form.Control
                                type="text"
                                placeholder="Optional"
                            />
                        </Col>
                        <Col>
                            <Form.Label>ISSUE DATE</Form.Label>
                            <InputGroup>
                                <Form.Control
                                    type="text"
                                    placeholder="Month"
                                />
                                <InputGroup.Append>
                                    <InputGroup.Text id="inputGroupPrepend">/</InputGroup.Text>
                                </InputGroup.Append>
                                <Form.Control
                                    type="text"
                                    placeholder="Year"
                                    style={{ marginLeft: '-1px' }}
                                />
                            </InputGroup>
                        </Col>
                    </Form.Row>
                </Form >
            </div >
        )
    }
}

export default BondPricingOne;
